message: Let's split this evenly, Bob. Fair is fair!
I think I deserve a bit more, don't you?
Okay, I'll give you a bit more, Bob, but I'm not going to give away the farm! Let's compromise.
You're getting a bit desperate, aren't you? I think I'll take a bit more.
Alright, Bob, I'm willing to meet you halfway. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
